name: Maria Brock
position: Front End Web Developer, GP Publishing Workflow
description: A Software Developer who loves problem solving, puzzles, and art. Fan of gaming, learning, and crocheting adorable, nerdy things. Powered by coffee.

name: Castle Crawford
description: A food fanatic, day hiker, video game vanquisher, Corgi lover, and Software Developer. Loves being part of a team focused on making a difference.

name: Tyler Lemburg, MSc
description: A Senior Software Engineer working remotely for Cognito. Tyler built the first iteration of JobViz. He has worked for several nonprofits as a web developer and recently earned a Masters in Climatology.

name: Arda Turkmen
description: Arda is a senior at Vanderbilt University, majoring in Computer Science and Mathematics. He was key in developing our early website in 2019-2020 using Node.JS, React, and SQL managed through AWS.
